text: Phrygian can refer to: *Anything relating to the region of Phrygia *Anything relating to the Phrygians, an ethnic group *Phrygian language, their language *Phrygian cap, once characteristic of the region *Phrygian mode in music *A follower of Montanism, an early Christian movement in Phrygia Category:Language and nationality disambiguation pages
title: Phrygian
